article_title: Private Exchange Growth Hits 8M, But Slows Among Large Employers

article_metadata.description: About 8 million Americans are enrolled in medical coverage for this year via a private exchange, which allows employees to navigate health benefits through an online portal, according to new data from Accenture. But growth projections are more muted than Accenture’s earlier forecasts. While growth of private exchange enrollment jumped 35% from [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
